journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: Java Developer focused on backend development, specialized in Spring Boot 3.5 and RESTful API architecture. Has over 2,000 hours of hands-on experience building production-oriented projects using Java 21, PostgreSQL, and enterprise development practices. /n/nHolds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, with academic and practical training in software engineering, data structures, and full-stack fundamentals, with a strong emphasis on backend development. Works with a consistent focus on best practices such as clean code organization, separation of concerns, version control, testing, and API security. /n/nBrings a background in international scientific research, which shapes an analytical, methodical, and systematic approach to problem-solving. This experience directly influences how software solutions are designed: clear problem definition, well-structured implementation, and continuous validation. /n/nCurrently develops and maintains personal projects focused on REST APIs, authentication, data modeling, system integration, and architectural best practices, using the portfolio as a space for technical consolidation and continuous learning.
